words_with_descriptions.beetle: An insect with a hard shell and numerous species worldwide.
words_with_descriptions.owl: A nocturnal bird known for its distinctive hoot and rotating head.
words_with_descriptions.swallow: A small bird known for its swift, graceful flight and migration habits.
words_with_descriptions.goat: A hardy domesticated animal known for its climbing ability and diverse diet.
words_with_descriptions.macaw: A type of large, brightly colored parrot from the rainforests of Central and South America.
words_with_descriptions.fin: A thin component on the bodies of fish and some marine mammals used for stability in water.
words_with_descriptions.otter: An aquatic mammal known for its playfulness and ability to use tools.
words_with_descriptions.eagle: A large bird of prey noted for its powerful build and keen eyesight.
words_with_descriptions.walrus: A large marine mammal with distinctive tusks and whiskers.
words_with_descriptions.hen: A female bird, especially of a domestic fowl.
